QuestData.Title: Blades of Amber
QuestData.Description:
The mantid are frail and easily broken, but the amber blades they wield are formidable.
With a bit of work, they could be reshaped into something suitable for the mogu.
Bring them to me, and I can see about repurposing them to service the Rajani.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Amber Blades from Vil'thik mantid in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
